name: assignee_sequence
description: order in which assignee appears in patent file; sequence for this table begins at {0}.

name: assignee_id
description: unique assignee ID generated by the disambiguation algorithm

name: disambig_assignee_individual_name_first
description: first name, if assignee is an individual

name: disambig_assignee_individual_name_last
description: last name, if assignee is an individual

name: disambig_assignee_organization
description: organization name if assignee is an organization

name: assignee_type
description: classification of assignee (1 - Unassigned, 2 - US Company or Corporation, 3 - Foreign Company or Corporation, 4 - US Individual, 5 - Foreign Individual, 6 - US Federal Government, 7 - Foreign Government, 8 - US County Government, 9 - US State Government. Note: A "1" appearing before any of these codes signifies part interest

name: location_id
description: unique location id generated by the disambiguation algorithm
